recipe.title: Piña Colada
instructions: Combine the rum, coconut cream and pineapple juice in a cocktail shaker and shake vigorously, or whirl briefly in an electric blender. Put the ice cubes in a highball glass, add the liquid and garnish with the pineapple and cherry.
